Uses of Class
explicit.ProbModelChecker

  • Packages that use ProbModelChecker 
    Package Description
    explicit
    Explicit-state probabilistic model checking engine, implemented in Java, and quantitative abstraction refinement techniques (see QuantAbstractRefine).

    • Uses of ProbModelChecker in explicit

      Subclasses of ProbModelChecker in explicit 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CTMCModelChecker
      Explicit-state model checker for continuous-time Markov chains (CTMCs).
      class  CTMDPModelChecker
      Explicit-state model checker for continuous-time Markov decision processes (CTMDPs).
      class  DTMCModelChecker
      Explicit-state model checker for discrete-time Markov chains (DTMCs).
      class  MDPModelChecker
      Explicit-state model checker for Markov decision processes (MDPs).
      class  STPGModelChecker
      Explicit-state model checker for two-player stochastic games (STPGs).

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ProbModelChecker QuantAbstractRefine.getModelChecker()
